dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] INFRINGEMENT NOTIFICATION]
dmca.body:
EN


-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, November 10, 2004 8:27 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] INFRINGEMENT NOTIFICATION]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] INFRINGEMENT NOTIFICATION
Date: Wed, 10 Nov 2004 19:12:39 +1000
From: jpandher@student.bond.edu.au
To: admin@ratedesi.com, abuse@theplanet.com,
RATEDESI.COM@domainsbyproxy.com,         jpandher@student.bond.edu.au

Actual E-mail Text:
RATEDESI.COM
C/- Domains by Proxy, Inc.
15111 N Hayden Rd., Suite 160
PMB353
Scottsdale, Arizona 85260
United States
(480) 624-2599

Subject: INFRINGEMENT NOTIFICATION: User Account "Reshma"

Hello Ratedesi.com (c/- Domains by Proxy, Inc),

I am notifying you of a violation of copyright and defamatory material.
I have included the following information for you to take actions as per
the RateDesi Webmaster Warning webpage
[http://www.ratedesi.com/warning.php?i=53435].

INFRINGEMENT NOTIFICATION:
1.        The copyrighted work and defamatory material at issue is an image
and
associated text that appears on:
http://www.ratedesi.com/view.php?i=53435
http://www.ratedesi.com/images/members/53435.jpg
http://www.ratedesi.com/images/members/53435.jpg?7
2.        Infringing Web Pages (the url listed In blue):
http://www.ratedesi.com/view.php?i=53435
http://www.ratedesi.com/images/members/53435.jpg 23k
http://www.ratedesi.com/images/members/53435.jpg?7 23k

I am in the picture (first from left) of the copyrighted Image
(material) which was taken by Ms. Hermeet Kaur on April 10, 2004.  For
clarification she can be reached via telephone at +61 401 135315.

3. You may contact myself, Jasreen Kaur Pandher via e-mail at
jpandher@student.bond.edu.au.
4. I know for a fact that use of the copyrighted image and the
defamatory material contained within the above webpage/s have not been
authorised by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.
7. I request that the above material outlined above is removed within
seven (7) days of this notification.  If you fail to comply with this
notification legal proceedings with be initiated under the jurisdiction
of the State of Queensland, Australia.

Please let me know if I can be of further assistance in the prompt
removal of the above material.

Kind Regards,

Jasreen Kaur Pandher
jpandher@student.bond.edu.au
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFBkiVEvK/XpJs6oyURAqTqAKCOBe6nDka/mimD/dnF0wgtcEuFawCeP51U
YLJMJGDU/JHvJb6Vk8KncYk=
=iXIM
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
